forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 51F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers and windy conditions developing overnight. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this evening. Windy with showers and perhaps a rumble of thunder developing overnight. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Thunder possible. High 9C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 48F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Decreasing clouds late. Low 4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain early...then becoming partly cloudy. Low 39F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain late. Increasing winds. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with light rain and showers. Low around 45F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy. Periods of rain early. High 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain early. High 53F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 54F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 41F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High 13C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 56F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High near 15C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 59F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 60F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
